name: BasicToken
description: Basic token. Basic version of StandardToken, with no allowances.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user sells wTokens to the AMM. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: Transfer
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user sells wTokens to the AMM. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOf
functionDecorators.description: Gets the balance of the specified address.

parameterDecorators.name: _owner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to query the the balance of.

functionDecorators.name: transfer
functionDecorators.description: transfer token for a specified address.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.
